https://hk.jobsdb.com/job/86263102?ref=search-standalone&type=standard&origin=jobTitle#sol=b9de889d14848bbeac60fc36072020834a298ccb




Finance Manager / Assistant Finance Manager

View all jobs

Tseung Kwan O Industrial Estate, Sai Kung District

Financial Managers & Controllers (Accounting)

Full time

$45,000 â€“ $55,000 per month

Responsibilities:



  • Responsible for annual and interim reports, including MD&A, financial statements, disclosure notes, ensure compliance with the Hong Kong Listing Rules, Hong Kong Financial Reporting Standards (â€œHKFRSâ€) and the Companies Ordinance
  • Prepare group consolidation and manage monthly reporting package from other Business Units
  • Responsible for the group financial planning process, including forecasting and budgeting, etc.
  • Prepare group management report as well as financial analysis for management
  • Execute on-going review and identify opportunity for process/workflow improvement
  • Coordinate with internal stakeholders and external auditors on reporting requirements
  • Perform ad hoc assignments and projects as required
Requirements:



  • Bachelor degree holder in Accounting, Finance or equivalent with professional qualification of HKICPA/ACCA
  • At least 8 years of relevant work experience, including audit and commercial experience
  • Highly proficient in both written and spoken English and Chinese
  • Independent, self-motivated, can-do attitude and proactive
  • Good communication and problem-solving skills
  • Well organized and capable of prioritizing work
  • Proficient in MS Office applications
  • Less experience would be considered as Assistant Finance Manager
  • Experience in TMT sector will be a definite advantage


Please apply, quoting the appropriate reference number, with details of your qualifications and experience, expected salary and a contact telephone number toThe Senior Manager, Personnel Department, Television Broadcasts Limited, TVB City, 77 Chun Choi Street, Tseung Kwan O Industrial Estate, Tseung Kwan O, Kowloonor email to usvia Recruitment Centre.
Applications received are solely for selection purpose. Those not invited for an interview within 4 weeks may consider their applications unsuccessful and their applications will be filed for another 3 months for future selection. Afterwards, all applications would be destroyed.
